description: Search parameters. For more information, see our documentation on [Search Queries](https://shopware.stoplight.io/docs/store-api/docs/concepts/search-queries.md#structure)

limit.description: Number of items per result page

filter.description: List of filters to restrict the search result. For more information, see [Search Queries > Filter](https://shopware.stoplight.io/docs/store-api/docs/concepts/search-queries.md#filter)

post-filter.description: Filters that applied without affecting aggregations. For more information, see [Search Queries > Post Filter](https://shopware.stoplight.io/docs/store-api/docs/concepts/search-queries.md#post-filter)

associations.description: Used to fetch associations which are not fetched by default.

aggregations.description: Used to perform aggregations on the search result. For more information, see [Search Queries > Aggregations](https://shopware.stoplight.io/docs/store-api/docs/concepts/search-queries.md#aggregations)

name.description: Give your aggregation an identifier, so you can find it easier

field.description: The field you want to aggregate over.
